snippet: As baseball’s top prospect, Bryce Harper’s fame outstrips that of most veterans and he has a chance to break camp as the starting right fielder for the Washington Nationals.
abstract: Fame of Washington Nationals outfielder Bryce Harper, as baseball’s top prospect, outstrips that of most veterans; Harper has a chance to break camp as the starting right fielder for the Nationals.
lead_paragraph: As baseball’s top prospect, Bryce Harper’s fame outstrips that of most veterans and he has a chance to break camp as the starting right fielder for the Washington Nationals.

headline.seo: Bryce Harper Deals With High Expectations
headline.main: Only 19, Harper Is Dealing With Expectations as the Next Big Thing
headline.print_headline: Only 19, Harper Is Dealing With Expectations as the Next Big Thing
